medical_history.chief_complaint: 3 days history of lower abdominal pain.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The pain began 3 days ago, is constant, mostly located in the left lower quadrant (LLQ), and has not been experienced by the patient before. The intensity of the pain is not specified, and there is no radiation of the pain. The patient denies nausea, vomiting, and fever but reports some chills. The last bowel movement was 3 days ago before the pain started, with hard stool, and the last flatus was this morning.
